Draw(BufferedImage, int, int, int, int, int, int, int) - Method in class drawEqu.houghLine
This function draws a line using the theta and R which is the perpendicular from origin to the line
drawEqu - package drawEqu
 
drawing - Class in drawEqu
This class generate the drawing from an equation that's already made and saved on a file it uses graphics to draw
drawing(String, Color) - Constructor for class drawEqu.drawing
public constructor which initializes the color of the foreground ( drawing) and the file name which contains the equation it also sets the size of the frame on which the drawing will appear
